boxes.title: Free Cancellation and Flexible Booking
boxes.description: Thanks to free cancellation and flexible booking, even if your plans change, you can easily cancel or update your reservation without paying extra fees.

boxes.title: Up-to-date Pricing
boxes.description: Take advantage of up-to-date pricing with free cancellation and flexible booking options to change your plans as you wish.

boxes.title: Top Quality Hotels
boxes.description: Plan your vacation with peace of mind, enjoying free cancellation and flexible booking privileges at top quality hotels.

additional.title: Private Vehicle Reservation for a Comfortable Journey
additional.description: Reserve your private vehicle for safe and comfortable transportation from your hotel to anywhere you wish.
